div.p: The SBRHS community mourns the loss of three outstanding young lives. Kyla McGarry '21, Christian Couto '19, and Devyn Crosby '19.
Please click here for information on registering for Kindergarten and Preschool
Please click on Read More to be directed to our online registration process. If you need assistance please call the school your child will be attending.

The Somerset Middle School Building Committee hosted its third community forum on February 5, 2020. Shown to the right is a rendering of one of several schemes that was discussed among the new construction and addition/renovation options.

Special Olympics Unified Champion Schools are recognized for their inclusive school climate; sense of collaboration, engagement and respect for all; and demonstrated commitment to inclusion by meeting 10 national standards of excellence. SBRHS is one of 16 schools in Massachusetts and 173 new schools nationwide recognized for their work this year.

div.data-alt: We will ensure that all students and teachers pursue excellence, achieve their full potential, and cherish learning as students prepare to be high school, college, career, and life ready.

div.p: We will ensure that all students and teachers pursue excellence, achieve their full potential, and cherish learning as students prepare to be high school, college, career, and life ready.
Somerset and Somerset Berkley pride themselves on their well-rounded education, including music and fine arts.

Athletics at Somerset Berkley Regional High School include 26 varsity sports. SBRHS students constantly demonstrate their support for our teams and athletes and their school spirit at athletic events.

The 2019 SBRHS Field Hockey team finished their season at 24-0, capturing the MIAA Division 1 State Championship. Come cheer on all of our teams and athletes including soccer, football, volleyball, cross country, golf and unified sports!

SBRHS was named to the 8th Annual AP District Honor Roll in recognition of its students' outstanding achievements in Advanced Placement courses and the high school's growth and success of its AP program.

Somerset's early childhood/preschool program includes both full-day and half-day option for parents. All preschool classes take place at North Elementary School. Contact Paula Faria at Chace Street School for more information about attending the district preschool program.

p.style: padding: 10px 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 15px;

div.p: Welcome to the Somerset Public Schools and Somerset Berkley Regional School District. The Somerset Public Schools enrolls 1,800 students in grades PK-8 in four schools -- Chace Street School, North Elementary School, South Elementary School, and Somerset Middle School -- while Somerset Berkley Regional High School enrolls about 1,000 students. We are committed to providing the highest quality educational experiences for all students as they pursue excellence, achieve their full potential, and cherish learning while we prepare them to be future ready.
